alert.note: Alert for Kent (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 11:42AM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Kent county. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will impact the entire county this afternoon. The greatest accumulations and impacts will be from near Grandville and south. Most areas will see 1 to 2 inches of snow as the band of snow slowly moves south and intensifies, however the area near Grandville and just south of there, may see 3 to 5 inches of snow by evening. Expect significant travel problems for the evening commute, mostly areas west of US-131.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
